name: Ekscape
description:
Story

Eks was once a hunter, but now he is a prisoner.

Trapped in Karel's basement he has to find his way out.

Can you help Eks find his way out with the help of your grappling hook?

Theme

For the theme of the game we had to remake a mechanic from a 3d game in a 2d game. We chose for the hooking ability from roadhog in Overwatch. After some thought we've also added other hooks from Overwatch like the hook from Wrecking Ball to move with the rope.

Credits

Developer - Joey  van der Wijk 

Developer - Coen Steuns

Artist - GalaxyyTearss - Twitter

Artist - Lucas Java - Instagram

Music - JoshRPM - Red Peaks Music

Extra

This is the 3rd game in the Karel Universe.

The previous 2 are back in development and can be found here:

Karel Kill The Voices

Haunted Voice
